title: Salmon Burgers
steps: In a medium bowl, flake salmon and mix with eggs, bread crumbs, onion, parsley, and chili powder.
Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Pack the mixture into patties, and fry for about 5 minutes per side.
Mix the Sriracha sauce and Greek yogurt to make the spicey mayo.
Top burger buns with cooked patties, spicey mayo, and other toppings.
